prompt:
Nurse: When did you first notice the pus and mucus in your stool, Mr. Koroleva?

Patient: Couple weeks ago.

Nurse: Have you had any fever recently, Mr. Koroleva?

Patient: No.

Nurse: Have you noticed any rapid spreading of warmth, swelling, or redness around the area where you've seen the pus and mucus, Mr. Koroleva?

Patient: No.

Nurse: Has the area where you've seen the pus and mucus become larger or more open, Mr. Koroleva?

Patient: No.

responses.gpt4: Have you seen any fat or muscle tissue protruding from the affected area, Mr. Koroleva?
responses.our_model: Give me a moment to check how I can best support you. I appreciate you letting me know. I'm going to take a moment to figure out the best way I can support you. Do you have any sutures or staples in the area where you've seen the pus and mucus, Mr. Koroleva?
